answers.answer: Congratulations. When was your due date?
My due date was for February 4th but I had gestational diabetes so they induced me Thursday

question: Our baby girl arrived last night (1/28/16) at 10:19pm. She was 8lbs 5oz and 20 inches. Had such a better experience this time around than with my first child's delivery.  Good luck to all you mommies waiting in your babies! It's so worth it!!
title: Baby girl arrived!
